comment.author: 46988643@N00
comment._content: to suzymillward on the note above: I'm a little confused as to why it only apears to be a few arrows(I couldnt detect any more than, say, 4), but I believe it represents the 7 sorrows or Dolors of Mary Mother of God.  The caption says is a painting of the Dolorosa, which I think is translated as "The Way of Suffering".  Thats the only thing I could think of.  Anybody else have a  comment or explanation on this one?
